name: Hudson Labs (formerly Bedrock AI)
headline: AI-powered equity research software
description:
Finance-specific AI trained on complex financial language for industry-leading accuracy and reliability. Our large language models interpret and condense huge volumes of information, so institutional investors can make smarter decisions in record time.

Learn more at www.hudson-labs.com

founders.name: Kris Bennatti, Founder
founders.description: Kris is a Python developer, CPA, and statistician. She has been published by the Harvard Law School Forum on Corporate Governance and the Conference Board and was previously a data scientist in the corporate governance field and Python programming instructor.

founders.name: Suhas Pai, Founder
founders.description: Suhas Pai is a ML researcher and software engineer specializing in natural language processing. He is a steering committee member at multiple AI organizations, author of a popular AI newsletter, and a mentor to budding data scientists. He has had a long career in tech, including being a Staff (Senior) Software Engineer at IBM Security, where he was involved in building critical security products used by dozens of Fortune 500 companies. He holds a Masters in Computer Science.

# Specialized financial AI
A web-based investment research platform including AI-driven fundamental research support, systematic forensic analysis, and the Hudson Labs Co-Analyst. 
[Book a demo](https://www.hudson-labs.com/</trial>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/675a3460217102646024e4f6_hero2.png)
AS SEEN IN
[![Preview Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/674ef08868cbfdfbf6803e28_bloomberg.avif)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<https:/www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-10-05/dozens-of-de-spacs-flag-severe-cash-problems-as-economy-weakens#xj4y7vzkg>)[![Preview Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/674ef0b380a2a1e4d9c7579b_wsj.avif)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<https:/www.wsj.com/articles/accounting-red-flags-are-common-among-public-crypto-companies-11670395681?mod=e2li>)[![Preview Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/674ef1d445ef412beea4da4d_forbes.avif)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<https:/www.forbes.com/sites/noahbarsky/2023/12/11/hudson-labs-ai-accelerates-and-elevates-equity-research/>)[![Preview Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/676001cce1da66e7349050a9_CNBC_logo.svg)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<https:/www.cnbc.com/video/2024/11/07/how-hudson-labs-uncovered-red-flags-at-super-micro-years-before-its-auditor-stepped-down.html>)[![Preview Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/675e3f66d66112ad74ff5533_FT-logo2.png)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<https:/www.ft.com/content/58ed6ba3-780a-41d1-a970-c1376ea4abdd>)[![Preview Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/674ef245da974026bbd2eccc_cfo-brew.avif)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<https:/www.cfobrew.com/stories/2023/05/04/more-firms-drop-lifo-amid-inflation-low-taxes>)
## Reliable AI built for equity research
Hudson Labs Co-Analyst
** _Consistent. Reliable. Factual._** Create structured tables from earnings calls, compare commentary across peers, and consistently extract guidance.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/6756efb12afa8a84874dcd8e_down-arrow.svg)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<#co-analyst>)![Feature Single Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/6759b97df626ca5c46eb237b_co-analyst-minireal.png)
Fundamental Research
** _Save four to ten hours each week._** Pre-generated company backgrounders, earnings call summaries, automated due diligence and more.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/6756efb12afa8a84874dcd8e_down-arrow.svg)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<#research>)
Forensic Risk Analysis
** _Find fraud. Avoid fraud._** Harness AI to systematize your assessment of qualitative risk factors, like related party, governance and management integrity risk.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67493471f8e1301e81fae68d/6756efb12afa8a84874dcd8e_down-arrow.svg)](https://www.hudson-labs.com/<#risk>)
“The best thing I've ever seen from AI”
— Analyst at L/S fund
“I’m blown away by what you’ve built”
— CIO at family office
“Better than an intern”
— Sell-side analyst

Loved by portfolio managers and equity analysts
“Thanks for building such an excellent tool for investors. I find myself checking it more often as my analysts feel more comfortable bringing me under-covered names, and I can quickly parse through some of the risks from a high level with the new “Summary” window. I can tell you care deeply for your customers.”
— Adam Parmer, _Enhancing Capital_

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Hudson Labs**

Hudson Labs, formerly known as Bedrock AI, is revolutionizing equity research with AI-powered software that enables institutional investors to make informed decisions quickly and efficiently. Founded in 2019 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S21, this Toronto-based startup is built by a dedicated team of five under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel.

**Mission and Vision**

The mission of Hudson Labs is straightforward: empower institutional investors with AI. Their technology specializes in processing complex financial language, allowing users to condense and analyze vast amounts of information—making smarter investment decisions not just easier, but faster.

**Key Offerings**

1. **Hudson Labs Co-Analyst**: This is their flagship tool, designed to enhance traditional research methods by creating structured outputs from earnings calls, tracking commentary over time, and comparing insights across companies. Users can save significant time—estimated at four to ten hours each week—thanks to pre-generated reports and streamlined data analysis.

2. **Fundamental Research**: Hudson Labs provides tools for generating automated backgrounders and earnings call summaries, giving investors the pertinent insights they need without the manual grind.

3. **Forensic Risk Analysis**: This feature helps users identify potential red flags, such as fraud indicators or governance issues, enabling them to avoid potential losses.

With a tagline of "Consistent. Reliable. Factual.", Hudson Labs is not just another startup in the fintech space; it’s a sophisticated solution for serious investors. 

**Media Coverage and Impact**

The company has already attracted attention from major media outlets, showcasing its effectiveness in spotting risks well before traditional audits catch them. For example, Hudson Labs highlighted significant red flags at Super Micro Computer long before these issues were widely recognized.

**Conclusion**

For institutional investors navigating the complexities of financial research, Hudson Labs presents a powerful ally. By leveraging AI in a specialized manner, they’re helping firms manage risk and uncover insights that were previously buried in vast datasets. It's about turning information overload into actionable intelligence—a crucial need in today's fast-paced investment landscape. 

For more information, visit [Hudson Labs' website](https://www.hudson-labs.com/).
